sentences.sContent: She remained resolute in her belief that the situation would improve.
sentences.sCn: 她依然坚信情况将会好转。

remMethod.val: re(表加强) + solu(松开) + te → 完全松开的 → 坚决的

words.tran: [物] 分辨率；决议；解决；决心

trans.tranOther: doing something in a very determined way because you have very strong beliefs, aims etc
